about.subtitle: Get To Know More
about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hello, my name is Norman Peters, and I am a Business Informatics student from Berlin with a passion for software development.

I am studying at the University of Applied Sciences, where I recently completed my third semester. This coming October, I will begin my fourth semester. Throughout my studies, I have built a solid foundation of knowledge in software development. What I particularly appreciate about my program is the combination of business acumen and technical skills, which enables me to develop comprehensive and practical solutions.

In addition to my studies, I have gained valuable hands-on experience through personal projects and have deepened my knowledge in various technologies. These projects have allowed me to develop creative problem-solving approaches while also strengthening my skills in programming and project management.
A selection of these projects can be found in the 'Projects' section.

projects.trafelfund: Travel Fund is a web app for tracking expenses during a trip. The expenses are converted into your home currency using an API, making it easier to manage your finances abroad.
